title: Al-Quran
description: A beautifully designed Al-Quran app with multi-language support, translation, and bookmarking features. Ideal for learners, this app offers a clean UI and lightweight performance. Developed with Room DB and dynamic server-controlled content for enhanced learning experiences.

title: Budget Buddy
description: Budget Buddy is a mobile application designed to help users manage their personal finances effectively. The app allows users to track their income and expenses, set budgets, view spending patterns, and make informed financial decisions.. With a user-friendly interface, the app provides real-time updates and insights into personal finances.

title: Daily Note
description: A minimalistic yet powerful note-taking app with support for rich text, tags, and date-based filtering. Offline-first architecture using Room and Jetpack Compose makes it fast and efficient. Great for journaling, task tracking, and daily reflections.

title: Ebook Market
description: A user-friendly platform for discovering, purchasing, and reading ebooks.

title: Image Resizer
description: A handy tool to compress and resize images in KB without compromising quality. Includes multiple aspect ratios, custom size entry, and preview. Lightweight, fast, and ideal for users needing optimized images for web and social media.

title: Quick Faith
description: Developed a short video-sharing app called QuickFaith, where users can upload and share faith-based reels.

title: Weather
description: A clean and responsive weather app showing real-time updates, forecasts, and location-based data. Designed with Compose and modern Android principles, the app integrates API-driven weather data with a minimal aesthetic.
